H0.text: The cover of which of Pink Floyd’s LP covers features Battersea Power Station. The Dark Side of the Moon

H1.text: The cover of which of Pink Floyd’s LP covers features Battersea Power Station. The Wall

H2.text: The cover of which of Pink Floyd’s LP covers features Battersea Power Station. Wish You Were Here

H3.text: The cover of which of Pink Floyd’s LP covers features Battersea Power Station. Animal

A4.text: Battersea Power Station is featured on the cover photograph of Pink Floyd's 1977 album, Animals.

A5.text: The cover of The Dark Side of the Moon features a line drawing of light being refracted in a prism.

A6.text: The cover of The Wall features a minimalist design on the front cover.
